attributes.action: MAKE PEOPLE AWARE OF PLAGIOCEPHALY AND FOR TREATMENT TO BE PAID FOR ON THE NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO MAKE MORE PARENTS, FAMILIES AND CARERS AWARE OF THE CONDITION PLAGIOCEPHALY AND BRACHYCEPHALY (FLATHEAD SYNDROME) AND THE PREVENTATIVE MEASURES THEY CAN TAKE, IF CHILD IS SUFFERING WITH THE CONDITIONS TO ALLOW FOR TREATMENT IN THE WAY OF A HELMET TO BE PAID FOR ON THE NHS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
